short_summary: Need NETALLY EXG-300-LR10G2-KIT and NETALLY LR10G-200-KIT to replace faulty equipment.
description: Acquire specific NETALLY products to ensure work functionality and reliability in rugged environments.
full_summary: ## **Tender Information and Call for Proposals** ### [English](#descriptionEn) | [Français](#descriptionFr) #### **English Version** Shared Services Canada is inviting the public to submit proposals to procure one NETALLY EXG-300-LR10G2-KIT and one NETALLY LR10G-200-KIT, specifically to replace faulted existing instruments. National Defence has a requirement for these devices as they are a standardized solution that has been proven to work with existing equipment and is reliable in rugged environments. This Request for Proposal (RFP) seeks to acquire the aforementioned equipment and specified the products by brand name to ensure compatibility, interoperability, and interchangeability with the current design. **Tender Details:** * Solicitation Number: BPM019704/24032 * Tender Closing Date: October 16, 2023, 15:00 * Solicitation Method: Competitive – Open bidding * Reference Number: SSC-23-00024032:T **Contract Information:** * Contract Value: To be determined * Contract Type: Goods Only * Contract Duration: To be determined * Contract Status: Expired **Important Documents:** The solicitation documents can be downloaded from the following links: * https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/D1A7EF10-A196-47AE-B29B-42C3F056089B * https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/C3289B74-1B02-4BC8-A373-12D839D66238 * https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/E7D00ED5-9349-4DE7-BFC4-096636B97F11 * https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/90477EE4-A2FC-4D5A-9A54-C9EFAB4547CC ### **Français Version** Services partagés Canada lance un appel à propositions pour se procurer un NETALLY EXG-300-LR10G2-KIT et un NETALLY LR10G-200-KIT, spécifiquement pour remplacer les instruments existants à défaut.
